============================================
core/misc/escaped_identifier
============================================

module identifiers();

  reg \busa+index ;
  reg \-clock ;
  reg \***error-condition*** ;
  reg \net1/\net2 ;
  reg \{a,b} ;
  reg \a*(b+c) ;

endmodule


----

(source_file
  (module_declaration
    (module_nonansi_header
      (module_keyword)
      name: (simple_identifier)
      (list_of_ports))
    (module_item
      (data_declaration
        (data_type_or_implicit
          (data_type
            (integer_vector_type)))
        (list_of_variable_decl_assignments
          (variable_decl_assignment
            name: (escaped_identifier)))))
    (module_item
      (data_declaration
        (data_type_or_implicit
          (data_type
            (integer_vector_type)))
        (list_of_variable_decl_assignments
          (variable_decl_assignment
            name: (escaped_identifier)))))
    (module_item
      (data_declaration
        (data_type_or_implicit
          (data_type
            (integer_vector_type)))
        (list_of_variable_decl_assignments
          (variable_decl_assignment
            name: (escaped_identifier)))))
    (module_item
      (data_declaration
        (data_type_or_implicit
          (data_type
            (integer_vector_type)))
        (list_of_variable_decl_assignments
          (variable_decl_assignment
            name: (escaped_identifier)))))
    (module_item
      (data_declaration
        (data_type_or_implicit
          (data_type
            (integer_vector_type)))
        (list_of_variable_decl_assignments
          (variable_decl_assignment
            name: (escaped_identifier)))))
    (module_item
      (data_declaration
        (data_type_or_implicit
          (data_type
            (integer_vector_type)))
        (list_of_variable_decl_assignments
          (variable_decl_assignment
            name: (escaped_identifier)))))))
